column4: If I install WiCD will the package manager automatically uninstall network-manager?
network-manager used to be uninstalled automatically but I think it's just disables when wicd is installed

Monotoko .. ok.. network-manager drives me nuts.. it won't allow me to assign a static ip that sticks through reboots and manually doing it through resolv.conf and /etc/network/interfaces get over-ridden by NM...
